languages.text: "Произвожу анализ... Утверждение истинно. Последствия еретического //осквернения//нарушения процедурного цикла// приближаются к критическому уровню. В рамках недопущения его превышения единица Оптикон-22 готова отменить ряд протоколов обережения //святынь//особо важных производственных объектов//".

"Analysing... This statement is true. The consequences of the heretical //corruption//disruption of the procedural cycle// are nearing critical levels. In order to prevent them from surpassing those levels, Unit Opticon-22 is prepared to nullify certain protocols related to preservation of //sacred relics//high-priority production facilities//."
languages.original_text: "Произвожу анализ... Утверждение истинно. Последствия еретического //осквернения//нарушения процедурного цикла// приближаются к критическому уровню. В рамках недопущения его превышения единица Оптикон-22 готова отменить ряд протоколов обережения //святынь//особо важных производственных объектов//".

languages.text: “正在分析……这种说法是正确的。//异端//腐化//破坏程序循环//造成的后果，已经接近临界水平。为了防止这样的后果超过临界值，奥普蒂孔22号准备废除部分与保护//神圣遗物//高优先级生产设施//相关的协议。
languages.original_text: "Analysing... This statement is true. The consequences of the heretical //corruption//disruption of the procedural cycle// are nearing critical levels. In order to prevent them from surpassing those levels, Unit Opticon-22 is prepared to nullify certain protocols related to preservation of //sacred relics//high-priority production facilities//."

traits.locale_text: “正在分析……这种说法是正确的。//异端//腐化//破坏程序循环//造成的后果，已经接近临界水平。为了防止这样的后果超过临界值，奥普蒂孔22号准备废除部分与保护//神圣遗物//高优先级生产设施//相关的协议。
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Analyse... Cette affirmation est exacte. Les conséquences de la //corruption//perturbation du cycle procédural// des hérétiques sont quasiment critiques. Pour éviter qu'elles atteignent un niveau inacceptable, l'unité Opticon-22 est disposée à invalider certains protocoles liés à la préservation des //reliques sacrées//bâtiments de production prioritaires//. »
languages.original_text: "Analysing... This statement is true. The consequences of the heretical //corruption//disruption of the procedural cycle// are nearing critical levels. In order to prevent them from surpassing those levels, Unit Opticon-22 is prepared to nullify certain protocols related to preservation of //sacred relics//high-priority production facilities//."

traits.locale_text: « Analyse... Cette déclaration est correcte. Les conséquences de la //corruption//perturbation du cycle procédural// des hérétiques sont quasiment critiques. Pour éviter qu'elles atteignent un niveau inacceptable, l'unité Opticon-22 est disposée à invalider certains protocoles liés à la préservation des //reliques sacrées//bâtiments de production prioritaires//. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「分析中…この主張は正しいです。異端的な//腐敗//手順サイクルの妨害//の代償は臨界レベルに近づいています。そのレベルを超えないようにするため、オプティコン-22は//神聖な遺物//優先度の高い生産施設//の保存に関する特定のプロトコルを無効にする用意があります」
languages.original_text: "Analysing... This statement is true. The consequences of the heretical //corruption//disruption of the procedural cycle// are nearing critical levels. In order to prevent them from surpassing those levels, Unit Opticon-22 is prepared to nullify certain protocols related to preservation of //sacred relics//high-priority production facilities//."

traits.locale_text: 「分析中…この主張は正しいです。異端的な//腐敗//手順サイクルの妨害//の代償は臨界レベルに近づいています。そのレベルを超えないようにするため、オプティコン-22は//神聖な遺物//優先度の高い生産施設//の保存に関する特定のプロトコルを無効にする用意があります」
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Analizando... Afirmación verdadera. Las consecuencias de la //corrupción//disrupción// hereje alcanza niveles críticos. Para evitar que los excedan, la unidad Opticon-22 está preparada para anular ciertos protocolos relacionados con la preservación de //reliquias sagradas//instalaciones de producción prioritarias//».
languages.original_text: "Analysing... This statement is true. The consequences of the heretical //corruption//disruption of the procedural cycle// are nearing critical levels. In order to prevent them from surpassing those levels, Unit Opticon-22 is prepared to nullify certain protocols related to preservation of //sacred relics//high-priority production facilities//."

traits.locale_text: «Analizando... Afirmación verdadera. Las consecuencias de la //corrupción//disrupción// hereje alcanza niveles críticos. Para evitar que los excedan, la unidad Opticon-22 está preparada para anular ciertos protocolos relacionados con la preservación de //reliquias sagradas//instalaciones de producción prioritarias//.
traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Analysiere ... Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Die Konsequenzen der ketzerischen //Korruption//Unterbrechung des prozeduralen Kreislaufs// erreichen bald kritische Ausmaße. Um zu verhindern, dass diese Ausmaße überschritten werden, ist Einheit Opticon-22 bereit, gewisse Protokolle im Zusammenhang mit der Bewahrung //heiliger Relikte//wichtiger Produktionsanlagen// zu ignorieren."
languages.original_text: "Analysing... This statement is true. The consequences of the heretical //corruption//disruption of the procedural cycle// are nearing critical levels. In order to prevent them from surpassing those levels, Unit Opticon-22 is prepared to nullify certain protocols related to preservation of //sacred relics//high-priority production facilities//."

traits.speaker: Opticon22_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Analiz ediliyor... Bu önerme doğru. Kâfirce //yozlaşma//prosedür döngüsünün bozulması//, kritik düzeye yaklaşıyor. Bu düzeyin aşılmasını önlemek adına Opticon-22 birimi, //kutsal yadigârların//yüksek öncelikli üretim tesislerinin// muhafaza edilmesi protokolünü devre dışı bırakmaya hazır."

In order to prevent them from surpassing those levels, Unit Opticon-22 is prepared to nullify certain protocols related to preservation of //sacred relics//high-priority production facilities//."
